59127.en:
<start_lip_sync m07801 _normal m00001>Now, on to the mission to capture
Delcroix. I'm warning you, don't kill
him. Just make him suffer at best.<stop_lip_animation m07801 CLOSE_MOUTH>

59129.en:
<start_lip_sync m07801 _normal m00001>Kisama! That's the Delcroix companion
that the scout reported!<stop_lip_animation m07801 CLOSE_MOUTH>

59130.en:
<start_lip_sync m07801 _normal m00001>Just in time! Let's see how good
Astoltia's monkey is!<stop_lip_animation m07801 CLOSE_MOUTH>

59131.en:
It seems that the monkeys in Astoltia do not have the ability to learn, that they would go to the trouble of coming
back to be killed after having saved their lives.

59132.en:
<start_lip_sync m07801 _normal m00001>Fine! If you want to die that badly,
I'll give you what you want!<stop_lip_animation m07801 CLOSE_MOUTH>

61988.en:
<start_lip_sync m07801 _normal m00001>Gah. We are defeated, Kisama, you are
no ordinary monkey.<stop_lip_animation m07801 CLOSE_MOUTH>

61989.en: <start_lip_sync m07801 _normal m00001>Kukuku. But too bad.<stop_lip_animation m07801 CLOSE_MOUTH>
61989.ja: <start_lip_sync m07801 _normal m00001>ã€Œã‚¯ã‚¯ã‚¯ã‚¯â€¦â€¦ã€‚ã ãŒã€€æ®‹å¿µã ã£ãŸãªã€‚<stop_lip_animation m07801 CLOSE_MOUTH>

61990.en:
We are not the only main group that came to this world. That's right. Captain Gorgonza is already on his way
to Delcroix.

61991.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>Ahh! <pc>! Something terrible
has happened! They're coming this way!<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

61992.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>Ughhhh...the master has been kidnapped
by Gorgonza.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

61993.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>I wanted to save the master even if I
had to use my body as a shield, but I
can't fight for some reason.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

61994.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>I had to pass it off as just a
Wardrobe. It's pathetic, isn't it?<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

61995.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>If the master can mass-produce the
potion, the ground troops might invade
this world!<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

61996.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>But if we can rescue the master before
they return to Demon World, there is
still hope.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

61997.en:
. I would like to thank you for your help this time. I hope it will help to become
stronger in the future.

61998.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>And when you are ready to help the
master, please come back here again as
an item master.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62000.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>If the master can mass-produce the
potion, the ground troops might invade
this world.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62004.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>If the master can mass-produce the
potion, the ground troops might invade
this world.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62001.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>But there is still hope. There is
still time for them to return to Demon
World.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62005.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>But there is still hope. There is
still time for them to return to Demon
World.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62002.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001><pc>. I'll come back here
again after I've trained for a while
and become a stronger item master.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62006.en:
<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001><pc>. You will train now, and
when you are ready, you will come back
here again as an item master.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>
